Chief Financial Officer

Thierry Mirville, born in 1966, holds degrees from ESSEC and Sciences-Po Paris. He has spent his entire career with VINCI, after joining the company as executive assistant in 1991.  From 2010 to 2018, he served as Deputy Managing Director and Chief Financial Officer of VINCI Energies.

In 2018, he was appointed Deputy Financial Officer of VINCI, in charge of the cash management & finance and tax departments.

As of February 2021, Thierry Mirville is Chief Financial Officer within the VINCI Construction pole.
